mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_INFO( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderStatus}, #{userCode}, #{orderDate} )
INSERT INTO ORDERPRODUCT ( PRODUCT_CODE, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_QUANTITY, ORDER_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{orderCode}, #{orderQuantity}, #{orderPrice} )

INSERT INTO DELIVERY ( DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_MEMO, RECIPIENT, RECIPIENT_ADDRESS, RECIPIENT_PHONE, ORDER_ID, ZIP_CODE ) VALUES ( #{deliveryCode}, #{deliveryMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipient}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{orderCode}, #{zipCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT oi.ORDER_CODE, oi.ORDER_DATE, oi.ORDER_STATUS, oi.USER_ID, op.PRODUCT_CODE, op.ORDER_QUANTITY, op.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM order_info oi JOIN orderproduct op ON oi.ORDER_CODE = op.ORDER_CODE

SELECT oi.ORDER_CODE, oi.ORDER_DATE, oi.ORDER_STATUS, oi.USER_ID, op.ORDER_QUANTITY, op.PRODUCT_CODE, op.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN ORDERPRODUCT op ON oi.ORDER_CODE = op.ORDER_CODE WHERE oi.USER_ID = #{userCode}
